message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $20,000. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.
Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the value.  To be fair to both of us, I could meet you halfway at $16,000. This reflects the true worth of what you're getting.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $13,000, but I'm not sure I can stretch further than that.
